data.title: Connecticut Boat Dealership and Marina Services
data.meta_description: Boats Inc is an award-winning boat dealership and marina in Niantic, CT. We Sell Grady-White, Parker, and Sportsman boats as well as YAMAHA outboards.
data.text:
Discover the Best of Boating in Connecticut

Are you in search of the ultimate boating experience along the scenic shores of Connecticut? Established in 1959, Boats Incorporated is an award-winning Connecticut Boat Dealership and marina located in Niantic, CT. Boats Inc is your trusted source for all things boating, selling Grady-White, Parker, and Sportsman branded boats as well as YAMAHA outboards. The facility also includes a 175-slip marina which gives boaters access to some of the best fishing grounds in the Northeast. We are open 7 days a week and for 60 years have been committed to providing you and your family with the absolute best customer service in the industry. We also always have a nice selection of pre-owned boats for sale on-site.

Your Trusted Connecticut Boat Dealer

Are you in search of the ultimate boating experience along the scenic shores of Connecticut? Established in 1959, Boats Incorporated is an award-winning Connecticut Boat Dealership and marina located in Niantic, CT. Boats Inc is your trusted source for all things boating, selling Grady-White, Parker, and Sportsman branded boats as well as YAMAHA outboards. The facility also includes a 175-slip marina which gives boaters access to some of the best fishing grounds in the Northeast. We are open 7 days a week and for 60 years have been committed to providing you and your family with the absolute best customer service in the industry. We also always have a nice selection of pre-owned boats for sale on-site.

As Connecticut’s leading boat dealership, we are passionate about helping you embark on your next aquatic adventure. Our extensive lineup of premium boat brands includes Grady-White, Sportsman, and Parker – all designed to elevate your on-water experiences.

At Boats Inc, we understand that choosing the right vessel is a significant decision. Our dedicated team of experts is here to guide you every step of the way. Whether you’re a seasoned sailor or a first-time buyer, we have the perfect boat to suit your needs and preferences. Our commitment to excellence ensures that you’ll not only find the boat of your dreams but also enjoy peace of mind knowing that you’re investing in quality and reliability.
